Examples
========

This section contains several examples generated from Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate how to use the ipypencil widget. The widgets have been embedded into the pages for interactive demonstration purposes.

Basic Usage
-----------

* :doc:`introduction` - Introduction to the Canvas widget with basic drawing and image export examples


.. note::
    All example notebooks can be found in the `examples` folder of the ipypencil package.
